title: Smooth Onion Gravy for Arthur

ingredients.note: about ½ large, peeled and sliced

ingredients.item: unsalted vegetable or homemade beef stock

ingredients.note: to replace wine or adjust consistency

method: Melt ½ tbsp butter in a pan over low heat.
Add sliced onion and cook slowly for 25–30 min until soft and golden.
Melt remaining butter, then stir in flour to form a smooth paste.
Gradually whisk in unsalted stock until smooth.
Add balsamic vinegar and simmer gently for 10–15 min until thickened.
Blend thoroughly to a smooth texture, adding water if needed.
notes: Use balsamic vinegar with no added sugar or salt.
No added salt, sugar, or salted stock cubes.
Keeps 2 days refrigerated or 1 month frozen in baby portions.

assumptions: Scaled recipe to half batch to maintain flavour balance with 100 g onion.
Replaced red wine with water for baby safety.
Used 250 ml unsalted stock to match ratio.
Removed Worcestershire sauce and redcurrant jelly.
Added 0.25 tsp balsamic vinegar for gentle acidity.
Derived nutrition from UK 2025 reference values.
